message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $150. I think it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $100 for it. Please let me know if this is possible.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $130. This product is truly top-notch, and I believe that's a fair price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose an offer of $110. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
